essential_properties.name: certificateFileName
essential_properties.description: Name for and, optionally, path to the generated certificate file. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.

essential_properties.name: certificateFormat
essential_properties.description: Format in which the certificate is stored on the appliance

essential_properties.name: certificateRequestFileName
essential_properties.description: Name for and, optionally, path to the certificate-signing request (CSR). /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.

essential_properties.name: caCertificateFileName
essential_properties.description: Name of the CA certificate file that issues and signs the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificates

essential_properties.name: caPrivateKeyFileName
essential_properties.description: Private key, associated with the CA certificate that is used to sign the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificate. If the CA key file is password protected, the user is prompted to enter the pass phrase that was used to encrypt the key.
